thread.title: "Play ball": Ten months after baseball shooting, Republicans back at bat

title: "Play ball": Ten months after baseball shooting, Republicans back at bat
text:
"Play ball": Ten months after baseball shooting, Republicans back at bat 01:27
Republican lawmakers returned to Simpson Field in Alexandria, Virginia, on Wednesday for their first baseball practice since June 14th shooting that left No.3 Republican Steve Scalise in critical condition at the time. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
